amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to require the Department of Veterans Affairs to apply the same access standards for Mental Health Residential Rehabilitation Treatment Program (MHRRTP) as for primary care, specialty care, and non-institutional extended care services.
